values: Its friends only, if you want to be on my friends list, comment, if you don't have a live journal, get one.

I'm on fire, may I run through your sprinkler?  ;) hahahahaha

  • I just had to come talk with you. Sweetness is my weakness.
  • Baby, you must be a broom, 'cause you just swept me off my feet.
  • Is it hot in here, or is it just me?
  • Can I borrow a quarter? I want to call my mom and tell her I just met the person I'm going to marry.
  •  Do you have any overdue library books? 'Cause you've got the word 'fine' written all over.
  • Are you as beautiful on the inside as you are on the outside?
  • You're hot. You must be the reason for global warming.
  • Have you always been this cute, or did you have to work at it?  
  • Hi, I'm writing a term paper on the finer things in life. Can I interview you? 
  • Your place or mine?                 
  • If I had a rose for every time I thought of you, I'd be walking through my garden forever.

    haha I love the first one.....
lol I changed my mind.... foxes!!!!!

Tonight was the band banquet. I went to Yorks before because hes retarded and can't pick out an outfit himself, I was there like a half hour and then we went to the banquet. I think next years show is going to be really gay. Its like the wizard of oz before dorothy came along. Drum majors were who I expected them to be, Brent Chris and Tony. I think Mrs. Sleeper picked some bad people for officers, and others should have gotten it, but thats just my opinion. I kinda think there are more people than just me that think the show is stupid and the officers and stuff should be different. I dunno I guess every thing will work out to be ok. I'm kinda disappointed though.

have you ever been under water and look up and see people standing there on the edge of the pool, so close to you, and then realize you are running out of air, and you start to panic, and you want some one to help you but they won't because they don't know you need help, but you can't ask for help either, thats how I feel

Ok, I don't know what to do. Every decision has good and bads and I don't know which one to go with. Today has been rough, but I think I did extremely well. I only had two kinda not so good times. I never want anyone I love and care about to hurt, and I know shes hurting so much right now and I can't do anything about it and it breaks my heart. I'm trying so hard to stay happy and in a good mood, but its hard. There are so many thoughts going through my head. I guess one good thing is tomorrow is friday.
I swear every time things start to get better, they get worse, I am so close to just giving up on everything

There is way too much going on this week. Today was band practice, tomorrow is the concert, wednesday will be my only free night if I don't go to church, thursday I have to go to my cousins birthday party and to get something to wear to the band banquet, friday is drum major finals, saturday is band banquet, sunday I better be sleeping all day but I will have so much homework to do. I have a spanish project due on wednesday, I worked on it for 2 hours and I'm almost done. I'm caught up till the 5 in algebra, problem sets are due some time soon, I'm just falling too far behind. I have been so stressed and taking it out on people I shouldn't be. Today my aunt, mom, grandfather, and sister all decided it was pick on Melaine day, that did not go over too well with me. I am like in the worst mood ever, you say one thing to me and I bite her head off, spit it on the floor and then stomp on it. I am so stressed, I have so much to do and they all think high school is a breeze, news flash its not. When they went to school their classes weren't nearly as hard as mine are, people didn't expect so much out of them, most people didn't go to college then, there wasn't as much going on then. Michelle had it easy in high school, she took boom boom classes, I'm in all honors, I get like 1 or 2 easy classes a year. They don't understand how hard and stressful high school is and that sometimes I can't handle it, I'm not perfect, I can't handle everything. Blahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

So I found out who made drum major prelims, and I'm not happy about it, I don't think any one is. Some of the people that made it are good, but then others that didn't make it definitely should have. I think the judging was rigged or something. We were talking about this at Chelsea's party, and none of us were really happy about who made it. I mean Kristen Ponte didn't make it, and she made it last year, every one thought for sure she would make it, I think she should have. I think Chelsea should have made it too. And some of the people that didn't make it definitely shouldn't have, but I don't want to say who because I don't want to hurt any ones feelings. Well thats just my opinion on it, and hopefully we will end up with good drum majors, but its not looking too good.

Ok today was really good, until like 30 minutes ago. I got along with every one in my family, Chelsea's party was a lot of fun, I haven't laughed that long and hard in a while, I was feeling a lot better, every thing was good. And then my sister and her lovely boyfriend come to pick me and caitlin up. I don't say anything to him, I never do, I will just be talking in general and he will have some smart comment to say to me, he threaten to give me a swirly and to help my sister beat me up... um yeah theres no way I'm going to like him. My sister is sooo mean to me when hes around, she joins him. And then she complains to my mom and yells at me when I don't even do anything. Any one that has been around me when hes here knows I try really hard not to say anything back, but thats not me, I'm not one to just sit there and take it, I'm not a push over, I say some thing back, but my mom had asked me to try not to since Michelle is like in love with the retard so I haven't said anything back. When he says something I will just be like, um sorry I wasn't talking to you, thats all I have over done, and thats like twice. So I got yelled at by my sister, for like 15 minutes, and then my mom for another 15 minutes, and then both of them for a while. I seriously hate my sister. I never cuss and I just want to like cuss her out all the time. She is so mean to me and I don't do anything, and heaven forbid that every once in a while I actually do say something. Her boyfriend is such a mean, controlling, retarded, fat, ugly, bald, jelly donut eating, cop wanna be. And my sister, well shes a lot of things that I won't say because I try not to cuss, but she is a slut, stupid, retarded, ugly, mean, push over, and does what her boyfriends want her to do. Ughhh I can't stand her. I hate how my family can ruin my day in a matter of seconds, I absolutely hate it, I wish they all would just go away, and my friends could be my family.

I should go to bed, but I don't feel like it. Lately I have had the  ability to make people mad, and I don't even mean to. If I made you mad, I'm sorry, I didn't mean to and I don't even know what I did. 

My sister is making a scrap book for my mom, and I was looking at all the pictures, and I wanted to cry. It was scary, to realize how much I have grown up, and changed, and how everything else has changed so much. I really miss how it was, when everything was good. I miss it so much. In the pictures every one looked so happy, theres one of me sleeping on the couch with my aunts dog, and I look so safe and happy, and its completely the opposite of how I feel now. Pictures are said to be worth a thousand words, but I think its much more than that. Its funny how such a small and seemingly insignificant thing can make you think, and experience so many emotions. It doesn't take much for me to start thinking about something, but I didn't really expect it to bother me this much. I saw myself grow up over the years, and all the memories that I had put out of my mind came rushing back. You know how in school you would sometimes right about where you want to be in like 5 years or 10 years, well I started thinking about that, and I think I have ended up in a totally different place then I wanted to be. I think its a good thing, but at the same time a bad thing. I like some parts that are different from what I thought, but others not so much. I feel like some where I let some one down, or maybe I let myself down. I feel like I lost a lot, and I now have an emptiness that will never be filled. But I also feel like I gained some things, but never enough to fill the hole. I wonder where I will be 10 years from now. I will be 26. Maybe out of college, or still in college, or married to wonderful guy working at a great place. Hopefully some of the people in my life now will still be in it, some people I don't know what I would do with out and I can't imagine not having them in my life, because they made such an impact. No matter where I am in 10 years, I know I won't be a failure, and I won't have 5 kids living with a drug dealer who uses me. In 10 years my hole still won't be filled, but I think I will be where I want to be. I think I have grown up pretty decent so far, and I think I will continue to, and I have a lot of people to thank for that, yes even the ones that hurt me so much, and put me through so much. Life is definitely difficult, but I think I'm doing ok, looking back on everything. And who ever said life is just one big game, was totally wrong, its no where near being a game. You can control a game, change the rules, make it all go your way, but you can't do that in life, and you can't just start over when you are losing. You do get some chances in life, but you never know how many, and when they will run out, so you have to make the best of the first one you were given because you might not get another. Its amazing how something that seems unimportant, can make you think of so many important things.








That is a totally random paragraph, and if you read it all and didn't get confused, then you deserve a cookie. It was all of the thoughts going through my head at the time, my head is a very confusing place.

I went shopping tonight, I got a pair of shorts, something for my aunt for mothers day, and Chelsea's birthday present, I would say what I got her, but then she would know, so she has to wait till tomorrow. Today was a pretty easy day, not much going on, slept for a while, I seem to be doing that a lot lately. I have also been kinda... bitchy I guess is the word lately, I haven't felt good, and when I don't feel good I'm not in a good mood, and when I'm in a bad mood, I have very little patience, and thats just not good because there are a lot of retarded people at king, and then I take it out on other people, and I just have been really touchy lately. For the past couple days it has hurt to breath in deep, like a dull pain, and I haven't had much of an appetite and I think I have had a fever on off, but I rarely show that I don't feel good, I just try to ignore it and hope it goes away, because I can't get sick. I haven't told my mom about my lungs hurting, because last time I ended up with bronchitis and phenomena and I had to get shots and go to the doctor and miss all this school, so I'm hoping if I rest a lot and take a lot of medicine I will get better. I told my sister about my lungs (in case I die or something, I want some one to know there was something going on and I just didn't like all of a sudden die, or if something else happens and I can't say that my lungs hurt) and she was like have you been smoking and I was like yeah... thats me favorite thing to do *rolls eyes* and then she was like have you been making out with any guys and I was like no HAHA. Ok I'm done now, I'm going to practice breathing and see if I can get my lungs to like stretch out or something, they feel tight, yes I'm retarded.

Ok that was the worst dinner I have had in a long time. I got bitched at the whole time by my mom, my aunt and my sister. I got called a bitch a couple times by my sister, and I didn't even do anything, I didn't say anything. I haven't felt good all day, and I get bitched at for a half hour and I didn't do anything to deserve it. Normally I would say something back, but I didn't because I don't feel like arguing. Blahhh today has been a bad day and I'm feeling extremely stressed.

I AM 34% ASSHOLE/BITCH!
I may think I am an asshole or a bitch, but the truth is I am a good person at heart. Yeah sure, I can have a mean streak in me, but most of the people I meet like me.
Take the ASSHOLE/BITCH test at Fuali.com
lol thats funny because its true. I'm not feeling too good, but I have to go to the mall so I can get Chelsea her birthday present, although I have no clue what I'm getting her. I think I had a fever all day today, but I think its pretty much gone now, I got to catch up on a lot of sleep yesterday. I had to go to school today so I can exempt exams. We had a bomb threat, right before lunch, that was gay. I need to do homework...but I don't feel like it.

I hope you feel better, I'm not feeling too good either. Good luck with spanish, I know how you feel. I love you and miss you bundles and bundles. Soon it will be summer, and that means no school and that means we can see each other much, much more. I love you so much and I don't know what I would do without you, I can talk to you about everything, and you always understand, and if you don't, you still say the right things. I LOVE YOU!!!

I will admit that I have some major mood swings. But sometimes I can't help but to feel that people deserve it. Some times my mood swings are provoked by things, even the smallest things, and other times its for no apparent reason. I think the reason why I have theses mood swings is because I have experienced so much emotion in my life, and a wide variety of it, and most of the time I just keep it inside, but then it over flows resulting in mood swings. The smallest thing triggers them, sometimes its really annoying. Lately its kinda been affecting me more than normal. I can't focus on anything for like more than 5 minutes, I am definitely slacking in my classes, my head is just stuck in the clouds, but its so nice there, but every one once in a while I come back down to earth, and its not good there, so I like staying in the clouds, but it makes things worse, but as long as I'm in the clouds things are ok, I hate coming back down to earth. The clouds are nice, I don't have to think about anything, I don't have to worry about anything, nothing can hurt me there, until I come back down to earth and realize everything that is going wrong, and how far behind I am. Its just not fun. And what makes it worse is I think I can control everything, and I can't, so when I realize that, I just go back to the clouds.

Some times I get really mad over small things, I was going to say stupid, but apparently I don't find it stupid. I guess its because it annoys me every time it does happen, so it kinda builds up. Theres no point in trying to do anything about it, it does no good, making me even more mad. Blah it just really makes me mad and annoys me.

I woke up today to a text message from Amanda saying she misses me, it kinda mad me sad, but happy at the same time because she was thinking of me and sent me a text message! Shes in Disney world right now, I hope she is having a bunch of fun, I wish I was there. I might go to down town disney tonight, but its a very slim chance, especially now that I have to go to my dad's wife's daughter's son's birthday party at like 5. I don't like any of the people that will be there, except for my dad sometimes, and my step sister's husband, hes cool, he lets me drink hehe. I'm almost caught up with most of my homework. And I think I'm going to take AP chemistry next year... yeah I'm stupid but oh well I'm good at chemistry and I don't think Ms. Bachteler will be mean to that class because it will be like super honors and they will probably behave better. I've been trying really hard lately to not think about things and to not let every thing bother me, but its getting really hard. It seems like every time things settle down something else happens and it just makes me think and worry and get stressed out, and I think its starting to effect my school work. So I need to work on that. Other than that every thing is ok, for the most part, there are some things I'm a little worried about, but I hope every thing will just work out soon so I can stop worrying about it. This has been extremely random.... I was just writing the thoughts that came to me, I have such random thoughts, I think thats why its so easy for me to zone out and lose focus. Maybe I have a little bit of ADD. Or maybe things are just too boring and don't keep my attention. Ok well this is long enough and if you aren't totally confused, then you are just like me and have random thoughts, CONGRATULATIONS lol...... congratuation... Amanda.... haha  <3 <3 <3 <3

I haven't felt very good today, I dunno, I feel weird. Like sometimes I feel fine, and then all of a sudden I will feel really dizzy and light headed and like I'm about to throw up and really weak. I dunno maybe I need more sleep, I have been really tired lately

Things are going pretty good. Not as good as I would like... but pretty good. I don't like being asked questions... I don't like having to answer them, and thinking about it... and I don't like knowing things, I used to like knowing things, but now, I definitely prefer not knowing things. Ignorance is definitely bliss. I want a care free life, and to not worry about anything, at all, so thats what I'm going to do, I'm going to stop worrying and have a care free life, I don't care what happens, I don't care what people think, I don't care if I screw myself over, I don't want to care anymore, therefor I won't. Hopefully leading to a happier Melaine.

Apparently mosquito bites can make you sick, if you get bitten enough, and apparently, I got bitten enough. I feel like crap. I have felt like I was going to throw up all day, I haven't been hungry, my head hurts, I'm sleepy, and I just feel bad. My legs itch sooo bad. Never allow yourself to get bitten by mosquitoes 37 times.

Other than that I'm doing pretty good. I'm a little sad though... fluffy has been limping a lot lately and I was laying on the couch and fluffy walked into the kitchen and she was limping and my mom was in the kitchen and I guess she thought I couldn't hear her and she was like, I don't know how much longer fluffy will last, shes getting pretty old... and I started crying, I might sound stupid, but I don't remember what its like not having fluffy around, when I'm upset or don't feel good, she knows it and she sleeps in my room with me, fluffy is the only thing that has never hurt me, and has always been there for me, I know shes just a dog, but to me shes more than that, she cuddles with me when I feel alone and lost, and she makes me feel better just to lay there and pet her. I will be extremely upset when she goes to doggy heaven, that will be an extremely bad time for me. I love my fluffy, more than anything.
<FONT size=2>It sucks not knowing what you want, and being confused. Blahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh why can't things just be simple . I never know what I want.....</FONT>

• Don't go outside in florida during summer by water at night with out pants on... you will end up with 37, yes 37 mosquito bites.
  • Don't drop a can of soda, and then open it...bad... very bad.
  • Don't procrastinate on your homework for 2 weeks... once again..bad...very bad
  • Pay attention to how many text messages you use, and how long you talk on your phone, and what your roaming charges are.
  • Don't fling a blanket off a couch if you don't know whats wrapped up in it.... there could be a little dog... sleeping... and unable to land on all four feet.
  • Don't talk about your spanish oral to people that have no clue what you are talking about, they will take it totally the wrong way.
  • Don't take people for granted... you need them all for some reason or another, and you never realize it until its almost too late, or it is too late
  • Don't worry about things, I do this a lot, and its not good, it gets nothing accomplished
  • And I leave you with the most important one... have fun and enjoy life to the fullest, don't regret anything, it makes you who you are and helps you grow, and in the end, every thing really will be ok

If I'm not married when I'm 30, I'm so marrying her..... She makes me happy, and understands me when no one else does, ugh.... why can't she be a guy, or I be a guy...

So I made the decision I have been putting off for like... 2 months. Jeez that was hard. I'm still confused about it, but I think I made the right decision. I'm sorry if you are mad at me, or I hurt you, it was never my intentions. You are probably thinking some things that aren't true, I'm sorry.... I hope everything is ok between us. And I think there are some things we still need to talk about...

There is too much going on right now, too much to think about, too much to worry about, too much to be upset about. I'm soo stressed, and confused, and upset and blah blah blah I don't know what I'm doing. I have a feeling I'm going to be in a bad mood for a while....

My dad made me mad yesterday. He asked me what my grades are, and me being stupid told him all B's, because thats what they are. So... my dad yells at me, for getting B's, in honors classes, when I have all of my hard classes, at the same time. That made me mad, but its not what made me really mad. My sister came with us, and my dad asked her about her grades, hers are worse than mine, and my dad doesn't say anything to her, except thats good. Ummm... yeah I don't think that is fair. So then I as pretty much in a bad mood the rest of the day, and my step mom's daughter had her baby so we were at the hospital for a little bit and thats just not fun. Yeah I'm in a bad mood right now

lol I was talking to Amanda.....

Amanda: I have to go have more blood test tomorrow

Me: Oh are you going to school

Amanda: Tomorrow is saturday

Me Oh, I knew that, I was just testing you

lol I'm such a dork.

York is stupid, I love York, hes actually a really good person, hes just extremely confused and lost and doesn't realize what hes doing, but hes extremely stupid..... sometimes I just want to smack him or some thing and make him realize what hes doing.... blah he worries me

My grades.....hmmm spanish is slipping, everything is pretty good. Spanish is definitely going to be a challenge for me, I can do great in honors chemistry and algebra 2, but I can barely keep a B in spanish 1... something is wrong there...

That woman my dad claims as a wife's daughter had her baby today....woopty freakin doo..... tomorrows going to be fun.....all day at the hospital with those retarded people that just make me want to hurt them....

I went to Target and dinner tonight with Michelle and her boyfriend. We were in target, and I was describing to my mom on the phone the stuff for my bed I was about to buy, and michelle and her boyfriend start making out..... I was like umm... get a room, don't want to see that. Michelle's boyfriend doesn't really seem like her type, and hes 24, michelle is 20, I dunno that just kinda seems strange to me.

Hal goes to court on tuesday about Abbi....lets just leave that like that or this end up being a novel...

It probably seems like I complain a lot, and I'm like really unhappy and depressed and stuff, but its really not that, this is just were I can get some of my emotions out. Really I am happy, not as happy as I would like to be, but happy. I do have a lot to complain about, but I also have a lot to be thankful for, but I don't normally say that here.... maybe I will one day.

Well I'm running out of colors I like and I don't feel like typing anymore, so I'm going to go now. I love you all, some more than others, but I still love you all lol

                                                                    <3 <3 <3

• How extremely bitchy I can be (I don't cuss, but thats just the only way to describe it)
  • My mood swings, they go from one extreme to the other in a matter of seconds
  • I procrastinate too much
  • I worry about things too much
  • I think about things too much
  • Worrying and thinking about things too much causes me to stress out too much
  • I try to fix every thing and make it right and control every thing when I know I can't, but I still do anyways, causing me to think, worry and be upset too much
  • I let every thing affect me.
  • I'm not trusting, and then too trusting. It takes forever to earn my trust, and when you do, you never lose it, because I'm stupid so it just allows people to walk all over me
  • I'm soooo stubborn
  • I'm extremely indecisive
  • I feel lost a lot
  • I fear getting close to people, so I tend to ruin relationships of all kinds
  • I allow emotions to build up, causing me to have break downs
  • I think of the bad things, but try to stay positive

I think I'm done... I don't want to think of any more things that I don't like about myself, I guess every one has things they don't like about themselves, I love me, and I wouldn't change me, its who I am, but I think I could be better, and I'm not who I used to be

I have never felt this overwhelmed and stressed. I'm so behind in school. I haven't done any homework since last wednesday. I have a week of algebra 2 to do, I have 2 chapter problem sets in chemistry due wednesday. I'm so lost in spanish. And its all my fault. I have been slacking soo much lately. Theres other things going on too. Blahhhh I feel so stressed and overwhelmed, I can't think straight. My head is stuck in the clouds. I need to get my priorities straight. I need a vacation. I feel... I dunno.... I feel like laughing, and crying, and sleeping ahhh I'm so overwhelmed. I feel like I'm on the edge of a break down, and like the smallest thing will push me over the edge. Every thing happens at the same time, why does every thing happen at the same time..ahhhhh

I think I have messed up a lot of things, I always try to blame it on other people, but I think I did it to myself, and since I did it to myself, I have to fix it, but I don't know how to fix it. Wow I really did mess up everything, I always blamed it on other people, but its all my fault, I caused everything, I brought every thing on myself. Wow this feeling sucks... I caused all my pain, I have been to blame for every thing.

I don't feel like going in to much detail, but every time I think that, it ends up being long. But its going to be organized

  • School.....is school. Not bad, but not great. I'm really starting to slack off, its like I'm a senior or something...oh well, my grades won't suffer that much
  • Family....is family. Abbi wow thats like a novel in its self...theres a lot going on there. Hal is doing pretty good, I'm actually proud of him, and I really like his new girlfriend. I almost threw a fork at my uncle..yeah I don't like him.Same old same old with my dad, and that woman that lives with him. Sara got mad at me today at lunch, because I said something about her boyfriend. He's mean to me, so I'm going to be mean to him, I tried being nice, and it doesn't work. Not to mention, he is always at our family things, he came to my sister's and mine birthday party...even though I don't like him.... and then he spent the whole day with us easter...which you are supposed to spend with your family....anyways moving on
  • Friends...are awesome. I have some really great friends, such as: Amanda, Andrea, Chelsea, Jay, Anthony, Seans, York, Jessica, Matt, those are the extra special people, that I would tell anything, and trust them with it, and know they wouldn't like make fliers and pass them around school. But then there are the friends that are just waiting to stab you in the back, and waiting for you fail, so instead of helping you, they rub it in your face. Those are the people you have to watch out for, and you stay away from. Those are the people that make me fear getting close to some one, in any way.
  • I have also noticed that I'm an extremely complex person. If any of you can totally figure me out, let me know, because I'm yet to. I always surprise myself. Maybe I'm finally letting the real Melaine out, instead of the Melaine I always thought I had to be, and the two Melaines are like fighting to see who gets to come out all the way. Yes I think thats it. Very few people know the real Melaine.... I think you all would be a little surprised to find out how I really am... maybe not.

 

Ok...I'm done now, lol I knew that would end up being longer that I thought it would

 

Oh...Sorry I got mad at you, I will explain it later, I feel bad that I got mad at you, I shouldn't have, I will explain more later...

I think this has been the worst birthday ever, and its supposed to be one of the best, go figure. My family is driving me insane. I'm so close to just hurting them all, or running away. I need out, and very soon. Ughhhhhh

So I turned 16 today. I don't understand why they call it sweet 16 though. Yeah there are some good parts, but there are more bad parts. I don't want to grow up any more than I have, I "grew up" when I was little, and I feel like I'm just beginning to "act my age". Soon I will have to be responsible and blah blah blah. I don't think its fair that I have to have 2 separate birthday parties. One with my moms side and one with my dads side. I don't think its fair that at every birthday party some one is missing, and they always will be. Birthdays will never be the same for me, so I just don't want anymore. I probably sound stupid to you, you are probably think "whats wrong with you, you get 2 birthday parties, you are closer to getting away from parents and doing whatever you want all the time" But I don't really see it that way, I would trade it all just to have one birthday the way its supposed to be. I'm like split on it, I'm glad I'm growing up and stuff, but at the same time I'm not. I know I'm definitely ready to get away from here, and I guess this one step closer to that.

People are starting to really make me mad. My mom just told me she doesn't trust me, what did I do to make her think she can't trust me. She doesn't trust me, so I'm pretty much not allowed to do anything for a while. I was supposed to go to Yorks tonight, I might still go, but I don't know. I don't understand why my mom doesn't trust me, I haven't done anything bad, I rarely lie to her, although lately the lying has been a little more frequent. Blah I'm so confused. I really think I need to get away from the people here for a while. I feel like I'm falling in hole, and I keep going deeper and deeper, at first I liked it, and I still do for the most part, but I'm just confused, theres still the angel and the devil sitting on my shoulders arguing over what to do, and I think I know which one I'm going to go with, and if its a mistake, then oh well its a mistake, I will learn from it, and if I get hurt, then oh well, I will get stronger. I don't think I'm going to go to Yorks, I would if my mom would let me stay the night, but she doesn't trust me. And I don't feel very good, my head hurts really bad, its been hurting for like a week now, and I feel like I'm going to throw up, blah you can tell theres a lot going on, I only get head aches and feel like I'm going to throw up when I'm stressed about things, or worried. I need to take something, and just like sleep for a year or 2, and then everything will be better. I love how my mom talks about me to other people, while I'm in the other room, and thinks I can't hear her, it just makes me feel oh so good *extreme sarcasm*. She says I hurt her, and make her feel bad, maybe its because she hurts me and makes me feel bad. Maybe I need to go to a shrink. My aunt keeps asking me if I'm stoned, shes asked me that like every time I have seen her. That really hurts, never will I do drugs. Drugs helped turn my world upside down, nothing will be the same it was, they have ruined many lives, and I'm not willing to risk mine, and I'm not willing to risk putting my family through something like that. You know what else hurts, how my dad considers his wifes family part of mine. I have one mom, one dad, and one sister. His wifes grandchildren, are NOT his grandchildren. His wifes kids, are NOT his kids. Just like I'm not his wifes kid. I hate how my dad forces me to talk to her, she is the one person I hate the most. And yes, I mean hate. So many times I have just wanted to yell at her, and ask her why she even got involved with my dad, when she knew he was married, and she was married. Every time I see her so much anger and hatred builds up inside of me, like if I was the hulk, I would be the biggest, greenest thing you ever saw. Ok I think I should stop now, its just making me even more mad and upset and making me feel worse than I already do

I have been thinking a lot about church, and I really don't know why I go to my church. Most of the people are fake, the adults are too up tight and stuck up and blame you for doing every thing wrong, when really, most of us aren't that bad and don't do bad things. There are like maybe 8 people at church that I like and get along with, the other ones, I pretend to like and get along with. I don't get anything out of going to church. Every time I go, I find more things I don't like about, I find more things that I don't agree with, and I feel like I get pushed even further away. So I guess the only reason left to go is God. But I'm having problems with that. If I don't get anything out of going to church, and all it does is push me away, then why go. Maybe I should go to a different church, like one not so up tight, and the people are nicer, or maybe I just should stop going to church for a while. I hate to say this, but God isn't my top priority. I'm going through this phase, were I feel I need to put myself first, and find myself, and figure out what I want, I want to experience things, if God will never leave me, then why can't I wait longer to have him be my whole life, and my top priority. If you are going to tell me to stay at church, and to fully trust in God, and just live my life for God, you are wasting your time, I tried that, many times, and it never worked. Don't try to talk me into doing something I'm not sure that I want. I want to find my own way, I have to find my own way, thats the only way it will ever work. My whole life I have been told to be a christian, and do what good christians do, simply because I'm supposed to. I want to make that decision for myself, I want to decide what I should and should not do, I think I have done a pretty good job at that. If you think any less of me because of this, that is your problem, you shouldn't, but its your decision. And I understand if you do, I used to do the same thing, but no one of us have the right to judge some one else, thats not our job, you don't really know me, you don't know what I feel, and you don't know what I think, the only reason you know some things is because I just told you some of them. You are entitled to your own opinion, but if you are going to preach to me, please don't, you will just be wasting your time. I still believe in God, but I need to find my own way, I need to figure out what I want to do.

I actually had to do something today. I had to wash my aunts truck, which is kinda hard when you are as short as I am, and then I had to wash my moms car. The most I have done so far is hold clothes, so I guess I made up for all the other things I didn't do. I wish it was summer, I don't want to go back to school, I have homework I have to do, why do they give us homework over spring break, like we will really do it, I know I won't till monday in homeroom or in band.

You know that voice in your head that tells you not to do some things, I think it left lol or I just totally tune it out, which is very possible. But its kinda more fun like that. I was going to try to go back how I was, a good girl that didn't do anything wrong and had extremely high morals, but I don't want to. I like the way it is now. I'm not wild or anything, I just want to have fun. I probably sound like a bad person, but I'm not. I was talking to someone about this the other day, and they feel the same way. We are just teenagers, we just want to have fun, and if it means making a mistake or 2, oh well, we will learn from it. Its not like we are doing anything that bad. And in case you're wondering, I will never do drugs of any kind, so don't think that. I don't know if I should be saying this on here, some people will probably freak out and be like "Melaine... you should be a good girl, and not do anything wrong, you have always had such high morals, don't let them fall, I'm disappointed in you...blah blah blah" But I don't really care if any of you are disappointed in me, or think less of me, it doesn't matter what you think. I know.... it does matter what God thinks, but I'm still very much a christian, and I always will be, and God is in my heart, and he always will be, I probably should be a better christian, but I'm not, one day I might be, but I'm not now. I'm happy with the way things are, and the way I am, and the way I feel about things. If I really thought I would be ruining my life or something or making a bad decision, I woudln't be making it. I let you all live your life how you want to, and you let me live my life how I want to. Most of you don't really know me, you don't know what I think, or how I feel, so please don't try to talk to me about it unless you agree with me. I used to care what people thought of me, whether or not I met their standards, but I don't care anymore, I want to have fun, I don't want to worry about anything, I want to do things that some of you may not agree with, and I won't regret it, you only live once, so live it to the fullest. You shouldn't be disappointed in me, or think any less of me, but if you do, thats your decision, and just like I made this one, you have the right to make that decision.

Last night I went to amanda's and andrea's and spent the night. We watched the cat and the hat, thats a good movie, it has a lot of adult humor in it, and go figure, I caught it all lol. Andrea woke me up this morning to go to the beach, and I got back in bed like 4 times, Amanda's bed is sooo comfy, I didn't want to get out of it. So I finally got out of bed, ate a brownie for breakfast went back to bed again lol and then I finally got ready to go to the beach, which only takes like 10 minutes. It was kinda cold at the beach. It was nice, but cold. On the way back we stopped at this place to eat and in the bathroom theres a picture of a naked guy with a leaf over his parts (as Amanda put it) and if you lift up the leaf an alarm goes off at the bar and you get a button pin thingy that says I peeked, it was funny. We then dropped of their aunt and cousin at their aunts house and then we went back to their house. Amanda and Andrea took a little nap, but I didn't feel like sleeping till I got home.Amanda pointed out that I say a lot of things that make sense when I say them in my head, but not when I say them out loud lol. Andrea understood what I meant, I guess I just have my own special language. I had a lot of fun, and I miss them sooo much.

So then I got home, and things kinda went down hill. I walked in the door and my mom followed me in, gave this look and goes you're in trouble and walks to her room to get something. She comes out with my cell phone bill. Ok I was told that I have free roaming, well who ever told me that (which was my MOM) lied to me. In Vermont I used my cell phone, not a lot, and I figured if I did get charged for roaming it would be like 10 cents per minute or something, its more like 2 dollars per minute. So now I owe my mom like 90 dollars of which I don't have so it comes out of my birthday money. I went to go get in the shower and my mom still yelled at me. She yelled at me for like 20 minutes, and I was like ok whatever that isn't my fault. Tomorrow my mom was supposed to be gone working, but nooooo my sisters friend had to go get pregnant and have a baby and now my mom is going to watch it tomorrow so she will be home all day. Grrr I don't want to have to be here with her all day. I hate how things can be so good one minute and then change in like a matter of seconds. But whatever I'm still in a good mood, my mom won't ruin this good mood.

I'm happy, like actually happy. Last night was a good night, I went to dinner with my dad and them, it wasn't that bad, and I hadn't seen my dad in a while so that was good. 

Thank you Anthony!!! Me and him have come a long way, I used to hate him, when really I probably should have been thanking him, but lets not get into that, it doesn't matter anymore. But me and Anthony have become pretty good friends, and then last night he did something for me, which made me happy!!! *big smile* 

Ok I will admit that lately, my morals have gone down. I didn't really try to stop it and I was ok with it, I was having fun and being a teenager and it doesn't really bother me or anything. But wednesday Jason would just say things and it would make me feel bad because he doesn't know somethings. A lot of people my age are having sex, and you know what thats their decision, they can do that if they really feel they are ready for it, but I can almost guarantee that they will regret it. Unless you really and truly love the person, which at this age I don't know if we even know what love is. I think you can love someone a lot, as a really good friend, and maybe even more than that, and if you decide to have sex, then thats your decision I'm not going to think less of anyone for doing it, but it seems like everyone is doing it, like seriously, that makes me not want to do it even more. Its hard to not give into temptations, but I think its better to not give in. You may love someone now, and love is an extremely powerful emotion, its the strongest one out there, but we are just in high school, that means theres still college, and then the real world, there are so many other people you are going to meet, so many things are going to change, and you have to think of those things. If you really and truly love someone and think you are ready, then go for it, but only if you are totally positive you are ready, think of everything, not just whats going at the moment. I'm sorry to say this, but the people that are together now, and having sex, probably won't be together in another year or so. Things happen, things change, and just as fast as you fall in love, you fall out of love. You will never fall out of true love though, and if you are sure you are in true love, and it will never go away, then why not wait, I guess that can go both ways, but what if it turns out you aren't going to be with that person forever. You may always love that person, part of you probably will, and having sex just complicates it. It brings new emotions and feelings, it makes you even closer, it makes the break up even harder, and if someone this age can handle that, then you are an extremely strong person. A couple weeks ago, when my morals were at their lowest, I probably would have done anything, (and I'm really ashamed to say that) but things change, things happen, you realize things and they make you think. Never again will I let my morals slip, it was fun, I admit that, but I wasn't happy, I wanted more, and it made me unhappy. If you wait till you are married and keep your morals up, I think you will be much more happy. I know every one has different opinions about this, and I'm not saying mine is the only right one, but its the one I'm going with. I don't think anything less of anyone that is having sex, or has had sex, I might be a little disappointed, but its your decision, not mine. My decision is to wait, and I think I will be very happy with that decision.

Maybe I will go to my dads tomorrow, or maybe I can go to dinner with him tonight, I feel bad.

Today was a good day, until like 30 minutes ago, and it wasn't that bad, just makes me really mad. Ok first period in algebra Mr. Johnson wasn't here, at first we had Ms. Faulkenberry, she wasn't that bad all we did was work in groups and play around, then we had some other sub and he didn't really care what we did. Algebra was actually fun today. Second period was chemistry. Ms. Bachteler has been getting on my nerves. First she goes on for like 20 minutes how we are disrespectful and blah blah blah and we aren't allowed to have cell phones, they have to be off and blah blah blah. We then went to the mulitcultural thing, when really there was only one culture.That was ok, much better than being stuck in chemistry. Then I was supposed to go to spanish, but my class was on a field trip so I got a "note" that said I needed to go do something for another class and the sub was like ok whats your name so I can take attendance. I went to first lunch and then to the band room, where they played cards the whole time, do they ever get tired of playing them, I guess not. Well they started getting a little, um loud and hyper I guess so I went to like the last 15 minutes of third lunch, which is my real lunch with Sean. And then I went to band, Johnathon and Abner made up a game and they were playing that and I looked at some pictures Chelsie had, there are pictures of me from like 3 years ago, I so don't like those pictures. Then I went and talked to Kelsey and them, lol I wish her luck tonight. Then the bell rang so I went to chemistry so I could get my exam grade and stuff, this is the part that makes me mad. Ok the whole time in chemistry I had an A, never once did I drop below an A. I did most of my work, I did good on all the test, I did good on all the labs, and all the problem sets, I payed attention and I took notes. I got a C on the exam, a C, how did I get a C!!!!!!! That brought my grade down to a B, one freaking thing brought my grade down to a B. I got the same grade as people that did absolutely nothing in that class, and that really makes me mad, I worked for my A, I deserve my A, not a B. Some people that got B's deserve like F's. You are probably thinking oh poor baby you got a B, its not the end of the world most people would love to have a B, but its not just that, I deserve an A, I worked hard for my A, and one freaking thing brought it down to a B. And Ms. Bachteler is like you should have done the exam review and studied, and had an attitude about it. I did do the exam review and I did study. Ughhhh that makes me so mad. Why even try when all that matters is what you make on the exam, I worked hard for my A, and now I don't even get it, that just makes me not want to try, and to just give up. That makes me soo mad. So other than that I'm in a pretty good mood and I'm supposed to be going to the mall tonight with Caitlin and them so that should be fun.
